name: me? on a date with KAZUHA?!
name_original: me? on a date with KAZUHA?!
description:
*PLEASE PLAY THE BROWSER VER AT YOUR OWN RISK. THAT SHIT IS BUGGED. ESPECIALLY ON MOBILE. I RECOMMEND YOU SCROLL DOWN AND DOWNLOAD THE GAME.  ALSO THE BROWSER VER DOESN'T HAVE A COOL ANIMATED MAIN MENU.

*PLEASE. do NOT take this game seriously

You wake up one day, who knows where the hell you are. The only thing you have on you is your phone. In fact, it's chiming right now! "Kazuha," it reads. Huh. The only Kazuha you know is Kazuha Kaedehara from Genshin Impact, the anime boy you spent $1000 dollars in whaling for. It can't be, right? But it fucking is. You're on a date with Kazuha Kaedehara. 

"me? on a date with KAZUHA?!" is a short and simple visual novel. 

  • mc isn’t referred to by gender, but uses a female profile
  • warning for creepy uber drivers 
  • 3 endings! (good, bad, and true)
  • 1700 words
  • around <10 minutes of gameplay
  • created in under 50 days!
  • my first game ! bear with me

cant download? play on browser!

credits! 

Developed by: XAEAXII

Written by: toughfeetknee (tiffany) (i also get an honorary mention)

Sprites: XAEAXII

Music: TERNOX, Kevin Mcleod, Potat0Master, 3xBlast,

Backgrounds: SpagootBpo, Uncle Mugen, hazarq

SFX: Eric Matyas, ZapSplat.com

Special thanks to Nighten for the phone script!

<33333

thanks for checking our little dating simulation out! if you have any questions or need a bug fix, message me at X Æ A-Xii#0052 on discord.

“me? on a date with KAZUHA?!” is a fan made Genshin Impact visual novel. “me? on a date with KAZUHA?!” is not associated with, endorsed by, or by any means affiliated with HOYOVERSE.
